subject: Baseball
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The Yankees pounced on the chance to draft Gerrit Cole, their vision of his 98-mile-an-hour fastball outweighing any dread of negotiating with the agent Scott Boras.
snippet: The Yankees pounced on the chance to draft Gerrit Cole, their vision of his 98-mile-an-hour fastball outweighing any dread of negotiating with the agent Scott Boras.
